metadata.title: CVE-2022-22909 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: HotelDruid v3.0.3 was discovered to contain a remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability which is exploited via an attacker inserting a crafted payload into the name field under the Create New Room module.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
